Title: Enacts the sustainable affordable housing and sprawl prevention act
Summary: Enacts the "sustainable affordable housing and sprawl prevention act"; exempts or limits environmental review under SEQR for the construction of certain new residential units to avoid creating unnecessary housing sprawl; limits certain rights to action under SEQR; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add §8-0119, amd §§8-0105 & 8-0109, En Con L; amd §600, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the public housing law, in relation to enacting the "sustainable affordable housing and sprawl prevention act"
